alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN BEDFORD AND SOUTHEASTERN SOMERSET COUNTIES THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm north of Wellersburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Gordon, Hyndman, Ellerslie, Wellersburg and Callimont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
